accessibility.title: Accessibility first
accessibility.description: Choose the typography that feels best to you. You can always revisit these settings from your profile later.
accessibility.extraSmallDesc: Compact text for fitting more content on screen.
accessibility.largeDesc: A little extra breathing room for text-heavy screens.
accessibility.extraLargeDesc: Maximum legibility when you need the biggest type.
accessibility.highContrastDesc: Apply a palette with bold contrast for stronger separation between text and background.
accessibility.highContrastLightDesc: Bright backgrounds with crisp accents for maximum daylight readability.
accessibility.highContrastDarkDesc: Inky surfaces and electric accents tuned for night-time clarity.
accessibility.dyslexiaFontDesc: Enable a letterform designed to reduce visual crowding and mirror symmetry.
accessibility.motionSystemDesc: Automatically match your device's reduced motion preference.
accessibility.motionReduceDesc: Minimize animations and motion effects inside the app.
accessibility.motionStandardDesc: Keep the standard motion and animation experience.
accessibility.saveError: We couldn't save your accessibility settings. Please try again.

theme.title: Choose your theme
theme.description: Preview each look to see how Haricot's colors and typography shift across Midnight, Sunrise, and Black Metal.
theme.revisitNote: You can revisit this choice anytime from your profile settings.

dietary.title: Tell us about your diet
dietary.description: Choose any dietary preferences we should keep in mind when making suggestions.
dietary.customDietDescription: Add a label and a short description so we can recognize your unique approach.
dietary.customDietDetailsPlaceholder: Share any guidelines, staples, or ingredients you lean on.
dietary.customDietNameRequired: Please give your custom diet a name so we can keep it in your profile.
dietary.saveError: We couldn't save your dietary preferences. Please try again.

allergies.title: Log allergies
allergies.description: We'll highlight recipes and tasks that need extra care for anyone with food allergies in your household.
allergies.knownAllergiesHelper: Add each allergen separately so we can track them clearly.
allergies.addAllergyHelper: We'll keep this list with your household so everyone can stay safe.
allergies.saveError: We couldn't save your allergy details. Please try again.
allergies.reviewDescription: We'll translate each item into our food codes so recipes and tasks stay accurate.
allergies.reviewTodoNote: TODO: confirm the best food code once matching is ready.
allergies.reviewReminder: Review the suggested matches before continuing so we map everything correctly.
allergies.reviewRequiresAllergies: Tell us at least one allergy so we know what to look up.
allergies.reviewError: We couldn't prepare the allergy matches. Please try again.

household.chooseSizeDesc: Select the option that fits best.

code.alreadyMemberSuccess: You're already part of this household.
code.pendingSuccess: We let this household know you'd like to join. A current member will approve you shortly.

nutritionGoals.title: Nutrition goals
nutritionGoals.subtitle: Tell us how you want to eat so we can surface the right recipes and hints.
nutritionGoals.categoriesHelper: Pick every bucket that sounds relevant‚Äîwe‚Äôll resolve overlaps for you.
nutritionGoals.dailyHelper: Set the metrics that matter most. Leave anything blank and we‚Äôll adapt dynamically.
nutritionGoals.secondaryHelper: Track these only if they‚Äôre relevant to your plan.
nutritionGoals.displayHelper: Choose what to see in meal views. We‚Äôll still guide you silently.

partnerOnboarding.creatorIntroBody: We'll tailor tools to help you publish recipes and connect with cooks.
partnerOnboarding.creatorProfileBody: Share what you teach, what inspires you, and how you'd like to collaborate.
partnerOnboarding.creatorFinishBody: Finish setup to start sharing your work with the Haricot community.
partnerOnboarding.vendorIntroBody: Let's get your storefront ready so households can discover your offerings.

midnight.name: Midnight
midnight.description: Moody plum surfaces with amber highlights for evening focus.

sunrise.name: Sunrise
sunrise.description: Bright neutrals with cranberry accents for daytime focus.

blackMetal.name: Black Metal
blackMetal.description: High-contrast graphite with ultraviolet sparks for late nights.

classic.name: Classic
classic.description: Warm light backgrounds with deep browns and lush greens for natural elegance.

fifties.name: 1950s
fifties.description: Optimistic pastels and chrome highlights inspired by retro diners.

sixties.name: 1960s
sixties.description: Psychedelic gradients and bold contrasts pulled from mod posters.

nineties.name: 1990s
nineties.description: Electric neons and grayscale pairings for a vaporwave throwback.

highContrastDark.name: High contrast dark
highContrastDark.description: Inky surfaces with bright accents designed for low-light clarity.

highContrastLight.name: High contrast light
highContrastLight.description: Bright backgrounds with bold outlines for maximum separation.

typewriter.name: typewriter
typewriter.description: Minimal monospace aesthetic with inverted cream and dark gray tones.

forrest.name: Forrest
forrest.description: Earthy lush greens inspired by deep forests and natural growth.

motown.name: Motown
motown.description: 1960s optimism and Motown sound with vibrant corals, deep blues, and soulful energy.

lazySundayMorning.name: Lazy Sunday Morning
lazySundayMorning.description: Yolk yellow, orange juice, pancakes, and coffee - the feeling of a relaxed Sunday morning.

creator.title: Creator dashboard
creator.description: Access creator previews and stubbed profile data while we build more tools for you.

vendor.title: Vendor dashboard
vendor.description: Review vendor-focused information with placeholder profile details until live data is ready.

qrScanner.title: QR scanner

qrScanner.statusIdle: Hold the QR code inside the frame to start.
qrScanner.cameraRequired: Enable camera access to scan codes.
qrScanner.permissionsRequired: Camera and location access are required to start scanning.
qrScanner.locationRequired: Location access is needed to validate proximity.

permissions.speechRecognition: This app uses speech recognition to help you quickly add tasks and ingredients by voice.
permissions.microphone: This app needs microphone access to recognize your voice for adding tasks and ingredients.
permissions.photoLibrary: This app needs access to your photo library to attach images to tasks.
permissions.camera: This app needs access to your camera to take photos for tasks.

errors.userMustAuthenticate: User must be authenticated to update profile

nutrition.caloriesPerGram: Calories per gram: Fat {{fat}} ‚Ä¢ Carbohydrate {{carb}} ‚Ä¢ Protein {{protein}}
nutrition.nutritionNotAvailable: * Nutrition information is not available for this recipe.
nutrition.dailyValueNote: * The % Daily Value (DV) tells you how much a nutrient in a serving of food contributes to a daily diet. 2,000 Calories a day is used for general nutrition advice.

privacy.title: Privacy policy
privacy.intro: This policy explains what personal data Haricot collects, how we use it, and your choices.

collect.title: What we collect
collect.body: We collect account details (email, name), profile preferences, household info, tasks, and scan events you choose to submit.

use.title: How we use data
use.body: We use your data to provide the service, personalize recommendations, and improve the product.

share.title: Sharing
share.body: We share data with service providers that help us run the app (hosting, email, analytics, AI processing).

retention.title: Retention
retention.body: We keep data only as long as needed for the purposes described or as required by law.

rights.title: Your rights
rights.body: You can access, export, correct, or delete your data from the Profile screen.

terms.title: Terms of service
terms.intro: By using Haricot, you agree to these terms.

use.title: Use of the service
use.body: Use Haricot for personal, lawful purposes and follow applicable laws.

accounts.title: Accounts
accounts.body: Keep your login details secure and notify us if you suspect unauthorized use.

content.title: Content
content.body: You retain ownership of content you submit; you grant us permission to process it to deliver the service.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.body: Haricot is provided as-is without warranties. We do not provide medical advice.

termination.title: Termination
termination.body: You can delete your account at any time. We may suspend accounts that violate these terms.

consent.title: Consent notice
consent.intro: We ask for consent before collecting certain sensitive data.

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.body: Analytics are off by default. You can enable or disable them in Profile.

sessionReplay.title: Session replay
sessionReplay.body: Session replay is optional and only runs if analytics are enabled.

location.title: Location
location.body: Location is used only for QR proximity checks when you scan a code.

voice.title: Voice
voice.body: Voice transcripts are sent to our processing provider to map inventory items.

inventoryCapture.title: Update Inventory
inventoryCapture.captureDescription: Pick how you want to log your groceries. Toggle between camera, voice, or text to capture receipts, talk through your haul, or jot down what you picked up.
inventoryCapture.cameraSectionDescription: Snap receipts or product labels and we‚Äôll prepare the data for inventory updates.
inventoryCapture.cameraPermissionDenied: We need access to your camera to scan receipts or groceries.
inventoryCapture.cameraPermissionRequired: Camera permission is required to scan receipts or products.
inventoryCapture.cameraModuleMissing: Camera feature requires rebuilding the app. Please rebuild with: npx expo run:ios
inventoryCapture.cameraOpenError: We couldn‚Äôt open the camera. Please try again.
inventoryCapture.noCapturedImages: You haven‚Äôt added any photos yet. Take a picture of your receipt or the front of the package to capture details.
inventoryCapture.voiceSectionDescription: Speak naturally about what you bought or used up. You‚Äôll see the transcript update live as we listen.
inventoryCapture.textSectionDescription: Add quick notes about items or quantities. We‚Äôll merge these with anything you say or scan.
inventoryCapture.textPlaceholder: Example: 2 cartons of eggs, 1 bag of rice
inventoryCapture.removeAllHint: This will remove the item entirely.
inventoryCapture.speechNotConfigured: Speech recognition is not configured in this build.
inventoryCapture.speechPermissionsRequired: Speech permissions are required to capture inventory updates.
inventoryCapture.speechNotAvailable: Speech recognition is not available on this device.
inventoryCapture.speechStartError: Unable to start speech recognition. Please try again.
inventoryCapture.speechGenericError: Speech recognition encountered an error. Please try again.
inventoryCapture.addInputBeforeProcess: Add a recording, a note, or a photo before processing your update.
inventoryCapture.noMatchesError: We couldn‚Äôt match any inventory items. Try adding more detail to your capture.
inventoryCapture.processingError: We ran into a problem understanding that update. Please try again.
inventoryCapture.noSuggestionsError: Generate inventory suggestions before applying updates.
inventoryCapture.applyError: We couldn‚Äôt update your inventory. Please try again.
inventoryCapture.cameraNotesPrompt: Try snapping a clear photo of your receipt or product label.
inventoryCapture.textNotesPrompt: Add a quick note about what you bought.
